text: Hey everyone did you know! There’s an update available for sprocket rocket! not sure if you’ve had enough emails so I thought I’d send a message here :joy:
<@UDJV5B73R> Sorry! We have no control over those emails, HubSpot sends one for every portal you have it installed in. You can turned them off in HubSpot's setting
Haha no problem, as you say not down to you, though it’s installed on the biglytics portal so everyone on that will be getting them!
Yeah, we have had other complain about the same thing. Wish we could do something
